# ðŸŽ¯ First Bounty: Create the Game Logo

## The Challenge

Design and create an SVG logo for **enjoy** that captures the spirit of the game.

## Requirements

- [ ] SVG format
- [ ] Works in dark and light mode
- [ ] Incorporates game themes (karma, collective, levels)
- [ ] Clean, memorable design
- [ ] Max 10KB file size

## Bonus Points

- Animated elements (+10 karma)
- Multiple variants (+5 karma each)
- Includes a favicon version (+5 karma)

## Reward

**+50 Karma** (Epic bounty!)

Plus your design becomes the official game logo forever ðŸŽ¨

## How to Claim

1. Comment "I'm claiming this bounty"
2. Create your design in `assets/logo/`
3. Submit a PR
4. The community votes!

---

*First bounty of enjoy. Make it legendary.*
